name: Alert Now
overview:
With years of notification service delivery experience, AlertNow is a trusted partner for delivering important, time-sensitive messages. As an industry-leading communications solution, AlertNow is implemented in more than 2,200 K-12 school districts nationwide. Last year, AlertNow was used to initiate more than 75 million voice messages and more than 25 million text-based messages to approximately 6 million students and staff.

As part of Blackboard Connect, AlertNow is committed to providing schools with reliable, robust tools designed to improve academic success. We share a common vision for the future of mass notification systems and how they can address a wide range of K-12 district objectives. Together, AlertNow and Blackboard Connect offer the focus and resources schools districts need to meet the communications requirements of twenty-first century learners and the communities they serve.

The AlertNow service is specifically designed to meet the needs of K-12 education administrators and leaders. As a SaaS (Software as a Service) solution, AlertNow requires no additional hardware, software or phone lines to operate. AlertNow is SIF-certified and compatible with most common school information systems.
